title: Fertility rate in Brazil
yAxis: Number of children born per woman
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of children born per woman. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
In general Number of children born per woman has fallen over the Year.
Number of children born per woman is gradually decreasing from 2007 to 2012, roughly constant from 2012 to 2016, and lastly roughly decreasing from 2016 to 2017.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2008 and 2009.
Maximum Number of children born per woman, about 1.88 was reported at Year 2007
Minimum Number of children born per woman about 1.74 was reached at Year 2017
